name: Tinja
description: "Tinja" is a logical puzzle game in which the player moves the stones through the maze, in order to put them on the given end positions.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo (or equivalent) Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: with 1024 MB VRAM compatible with DirectX 9 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 128 MB available space
